bibl.title: The Millennium of Papyrology (2001-)?

series.title: Österreichische Akademie der Wissenschaften. Philosophisch-historische Klasse. Kommission für antike Rechtsgeschichte. Papyrologica Vindobonensia.

bibl.note: Pp. 712-713: Appendix: "Ten commandments" for preparing papyrus editions; - "Ten commandments" for publishing papyrus editions; - "Ten commandments" for using papyrus editions; - "Ten commandments" for constructing websites of papyrus collections.
